role.argrole: thing awoken to or new state

example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (NP-TPC-10 (PRON_3FS هي)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تتعدى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-10)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الهيجان) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الاندفاع)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قبل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تفيق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الواقع)))))))))

(S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB عسا) (NP-SBJ-2 (PRON_3MP هم)) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يفيقون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN نومت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))) (PP-MNR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN قرع) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN طبول) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN رؤية) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامن))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولي)))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to the beating of the drums of the visions of the international security council

example.arg: على قرع طبول رؤية مجلس الامن الدولي
